project.name: Codification
project.notes: This project features a FizzBuzz script and a recursive factorial block that you can run and debug inside Snap! and also compile into various text-based programming languages: * JavaScript * Smalltalk * Python * C Enjoy! -Jens

scripts.comment: drag any example script into this ring:
FizzBuzz scripts for any language mapping:

custom-block.comment: a FizzBuzz version that compiles to any mappings in this project: JavaScript, Python, Smalltalk and C
another, slightly different variant of FizzBuzz, which also compiles to any language mapping in this project

scripts.comment: recursive factorial script with function header for any language mapping:
other example scripts for any language except C:

block.comment: filter a list for numbers. Try this example in any language mapping except C

custom-block.comment: nested FOR block example. Try this one for any language mapping except C

scripts.comment: try the current script by executing it:
convert to various textual languages. Use the watcher's context menu to export:

variable.name: code
variable.l: #variables i i = 1 while (i < 100): if ((i % 3) == 0): if ((i % 5) == 0): print "FizzBuzz" else: print "Fizz" else: if ((i % 5) == 0): print "Buzz" else: print str(i) i += 1

custom-block.comment: another, slightly different variant of FizzBuzz, which also compiles to any language mapping in this project
